attributes.action: STOP THE SMALL HEATH SCHOOL PETITION - RUINING OUR CHILDREN'S EDUCATION
attributes.additional_details: Small Heath school have taken numerous days off this academic year. We initially appreciated the teacher’s views by taking part in a strike to stop the school turning into an academy. Success on this point they are now taking several days off due to the sacking of one teacher. I ask the teachers, David Cameron and the secretary of education to review and action this matter urgently as it is ruining the lives and future of our children.
attributes.background: Small Heath school are still taking three days off a week through striking for reinstating a teacher. Whilst they do this they are ruining the education of our children. HELP STOP THIS STRIKE ASAP! Education is one of the most important things in order to excel in life.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Small Health School is the responsibility of Birmingham City Council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor

Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here: http://www.birmingham.gov.uk/petitions
